item.title: Pi changing bottom stat, 135/99, [pi] cant change max stat!
item.dc:creator: @s_w_3_3_t1 s w 3 3 t1
item.description:
@s_w_3_3_t1 wrote:

i canâ€™t change the bottom number of my pi stats currently they are 135/99
here are my codes:

playerassistant:
public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		if (lvl >= 135)
			return output;
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
	}
	return 0;
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;
	if (exp > 461000000)
		return 135;
	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
				* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}

player.java:
public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp)
			return lvl;
	}
	return 135;
}

and currently when i type 99 into z-file search in my source file these are the other results:
[1] CombatAssistant.java (Line 1157)
case 12999:

    [2] CombatAssistant.java (Line 2123)     
        			c.startAnimation(3994);     

    [3] CombatAssistant.java (Line 3781)

    [4] CombatAssistant.java (Line 3811)

    [5] CombatAssistant.java (Line 3880)     
        			case 12999:     

    [6] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 464)     
        	public void sendFrame99(int state) { // used for disabling map     

    [7] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 469)     
        					c.getOutStream().createFrame(99);     

    [8] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 878)     
        				if(itemId == 995) {     

    [9] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 883)     
        				c.getItems().addItem(995, c.getShops().getItemShopValue(itemId)/3);     

    [10] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 898)     
        				if(itemId == 995) {     

    [11] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 903)     
        				c.getItems().addItem(995, (int)(c.getShops().getItemShopValue(itemId)*.75));     

    [12] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 1087)     
        			movePlayer(2399, 5173, 0);     

    [13] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 1132)     
        			sendFrame99(2);     

    [14] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 1136)     
        			sendFrame99(2);     

    [15] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 1140)     
        			sendFrame99(2);     

    [16] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 1144)

    [17] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 1148)

    [18] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 1152)

    [19] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 1954)     
        			sendFrame126("" + getXPForLevel(getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[17]) + 1) + "", 4099);     

    [20] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 2023)     
        			c.gfx100(199);     

    [21] PlayerAssistant.java (Line 2163)     
        		int[][] itemsToCheck = {{995,100000000},{35,5},{667,5},{2402,5},{746,5},{4151,150},{565,100000},{560,100000},{555,300000},{11235,10}};

can only pin point me into the right direction?
thankyou.
